review: I am a Directv customer and somehow my bill has soared to over &170 a month. I have installed Amazon Fire TV on three of our tvs.  I have found that some of our family member rarely watch Directv anymore and prefer Amazon Fire TV. The children especially like Amazon Fire TV. I suspect it is because they are more open to change and the older adults watch a lot of news. We have seven tvs in our home and have three generations of people living in our home. I am considering disconnecting directv on some of our tvs and if Amazon gets more news stations I would consider getting rid of Directv.
author: Donna
